description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: the visit to France by the President of the Federal Republic; the Hanover Fair featuring the new technical innovations; the town of Trier on the Mosel River carefully preserved; TV experts from the Third World countries receive technical training at Berlin television training centre; the Frankfurt's Waldstadium the German Soccer Association celebrates its 75th Anniversary.
